sen.j: 高麗物（こうらいもの）とは、茶道具における中国製の「唐物」に対する朝鮮半島製品の総称。
sen.e: Korai mono collectively means tea utensils made in Korean Peninsula in contrast to "karamono,"Chinese tea utensils.
Korai mono is the collective name of tea utensils made in Korean Peninsula in contrast to 'karamono,' Chinese tea utensils.
sen.cmt: collectively means→is the collective name of,引用符を修正しました。
sen.e: Korai mono is the collective name of tea utensils made in Korean Peninsula in contrast to 'karamono,' Chinese tea utensils.

sen.j: ほぼ全てが井戸茶碗に代表される茶碗類となっている。
sen.e: Almost all are bowls typified by Ido tea bowl.
Almost all are bowls typified by Ido tea bowl.
Almost all are bowls typified by Ido tea bowl.
